Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet your highest standards and expectations. Given its unique value and quality, we believe it's worth more than what it costs us. Considering its worth to you, we're offering it at a special introductory price of $9500. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a piece that could potentially increase in value over time. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your collection or operations with this remarkable product. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
